name: B. Dima and Text Messages
statement:
Seryozha has a very changeable character. This time he refused to leave
the room to Dima and his girlfriend (her hame is Inna, by the way).
However, the two lovebirds can always find a way to communicate. Today
they are writing text messages to each other.Dima and Inna are using a
secret code in their text messages. When Dima wants to send Inna some
sentence, he writes out all words, inserting a heart before each word
and after the last word. A heart is a sequence of two characters: the
"less" characters () and the digit three (). After applying the code, a
test message looks like that: <3<3<3 ... <3.Encoding doesn’t end here.
Then Dima inserts a random number of small English characters, digits,
signs "more" and "less" into any places of the message.Inna knows Dima
perfectly well, so she knows what phrase Dima is going to send her
beforehand. Inna has just got a text message. Help her find out if Dima
encoded the message correctly. In other words, find out if a text
message could have been received by encoding in the manner that is
described above.
